content:
# We have successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore, bringing our inventory to 12 wood, 10 coal, 5 stone, and 10 iron ore.
# 
# Now we can proceed to fuel the stone furnace and start smelting the iron ore into iron plates.
# 
# Let's first add coal to the furnace for fuel and then insert the iron ore as the ingredient to smelt.

# Add coal to the furnace
insert_into_furnace(entity=furnace_position, item='coal', quantity=10)  # Insert 10 coal into the furnace
# Insert iron ore into the furnace
insert_into_furnace(entity=furnace_position, item='iron-ore', quantity=10)  # Insert 10 iron ore into the furnace

# Check the status of the furnace after inserting the items
furnace_status = get_entity_status(furnace_position)
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace_status}")  # Print the status of the furnace
print(f"Inventory after inserting items: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory again
